posts.content:
Details to follow shortly, watch this space!!

Cheers

Rikki
Will be there, Great show and always a great turnout of Vans

Stonor VW 2019
http://www.abvwc.com/stonor 2nd June 2019
Stonor, Henley On Thames, RG9 6HF

Club Displays in Advance is priced at £8.00 per vehicle including all occupants (if you are camping need an additional £5 per adult)
Most of the club displays are paying in a lump sum with their application form but can understand this may be an issue with SSVC. In essence I need to know how many in the display and from each vehicle.

I believe the best way forward would be to those who wish to advanced book club display make payment to https://www.paypal.me/abvwc/8 and in the notes place ssvc / name and registration then please put your name in this thread so i can collaborate.

*** If you are also planning on camping require additional £5.00 per adult so please amend the figure before making payment ***

Thank you for your support

SSVC Club Display Stonor VW 2019

ssvc1 Rikki James - 1954 samba (paid)
ssvc2 Ian White - 1960 Devon (paid)
ssvc3 DOUGAL - 67 Kombi (Gertjan paid)
ssvc4 Scott - 1957 PGSG (paid)
ssvc5 Gary & Sally Collins 1967 (paid)
ssvc6 John James - 54 (paid) (camping pass Z31)


Alternatively if you do not want to pre-book, we cannot guarantee that you will be able to join the SSVC display on the day but see details below;

Day Tickets - Can be booked on below link at £9.90 per adult in advance or on the gate at £11.00 per adult (under 16's remain free)
Camping - Can be booked on below link at £22.00 per adult
https://stonor.digitickets.co.uk/event- ... tID=18059&

This may seem strange but the day ticket and most of the camping fees go directly to Stonor Park.

Regards

Daz
www.abvwc.com/stonor
